Key Match Events: McCann hit a two-run homer off Hunter Brown
Rooker hit an RBI single off Caleb Ferguson
McCann hit a two-run homer in the sixth inning
Rooker had an RBI single in the third inning
Post-Match Reflections: The Astros have lost three straight games and their lead in the AL West has narrowed to four games over Seattle with 17 to play
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brent Rooker became the first A's player with at least 100 RBIs in a single season since Matt Olson
Jose Altuve exited the game after the fifth inning with right side discomfort
